## Checklist

Before submitting, please confirm:

- [ ] This tool has a genuine free tier (not just a trial, or trial is 30+ days)
- [ ] The tool is actively maintained (updated within last 12 months)
- [ ] I have verified the free tier details are accurate
- [ ] The website link is working and goes to the official site
- [ ] This tool is not already listed in the README
- [ ] I am not including any affiliate or referral links
- [ ] This tool is relevant to data engineering, analytics, or data science
